title: Experiences
subtitle: Our experiences
desc: There is no better way to learn what Mochiling can offer than check the places where we have enjoyed. Do you want us to help you to create yours?

navigate.map: Do you want to interact with the map?

other-experiences.title: other experiences here
other-experiences.desc: There are more experiences in the same countries. Check them out!

delete: Do you want to remove {{title}} from experiences?

slug.label: Id
slug.desc: It has to be unique, and it can't contain weird characters.
slug.weird: In the Id, no weird characters, spaces, capital letters...

mainImageURL.label: Key image
mainImageURL.desc: The highlighted image of the experience. It will be saved with **1200x900** at max

imagesListURL.label: Secondary images
imagesListURL.desc: These images will appear in the list of the experience page. It will be saved at **320x320** size

instagramTag.label: Instagram tag
instagramTag.desc: If you want the users to check more photos in Instagram. Don't add the **#** character

shortDesc.label: Short description
shortDesc.desc: This is the short description of the experience

longDesc.label: Long description
longDesc.desc: This is the text that appears in the experience page

youtubeURL.label: Video URL
youtubeURL.desc: YouTube share URL. Remember it has to be like **https://www.youtube.com/embed/lBf4FbtxTO8**

published.label: Visible?
published.desc: Do you want it to be public?

countries.label: Visited countries
countries.desc: All the visited countries during the experience

authors.label: Trip members
authors.desc: Mochiling members who did the trip
